General.Name: Corre Energy BV
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Corre Energy B.V. engages in the development and operation of long duration energy storage (LDES) projects and products in Europe. The company also develops and constructs energy storage facilities. In addition, it is involved in the production of green hydrogen. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Groningen, the Netherlands. Corre Energy B.V. is a subsidiary of Corre Energy Group Holdings C.V.
